gameobject

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobject.GameObject
      • gameobject.Bullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalBullet

    public abstract class Bullet
extends GameObject
implements DynamicObject
    this class creates the bullet object that works with the players and objects
    Author:
    Kabir Batra and Kaie Chen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(float x,
              float y,
              float angle,
              float speed,
              GameObject shooter,
              java.lang.String name)
        This is a basic blue print for a bullet!
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate position of the bullet to spawn in
        y - the y coordinate position of the bullet to spawn in
        angle - the angle to which the bullet shall travel
        speed - the speed to which the bullet shall move
        shooter - Who has shot this bullet
        name - The name of this unique bullet
